CONVERSATION GROUP: BK revised from "Maybe you should send someone with a little muscle to scare him off."

BK men -> they (BK WOTC)
BK was I tried that too! The past tenday I had two of my bodyguards chase him to his hiding spot. I saw them enter, they never came out.
BK was "I tried that once.  He was so angry... I was sure he was going to kill me.  He said everyone gets one mistake.  Then he started laughing.
Bk Oh good, it's been too long since I've killed someone.
BK was "Of course not, I have no idea who you are. But I'm always waiting for someone.  Might as well be you."
I don't want to join you, I want the sapphires.
BK was "Good.  Allow me to introduce my associates"
BK was "Ok, what do you want for those sapphires and a promise to leave the merchant alone.
I'm here to ask you to leave that gem merchant alone and hand over his stolen goods.
[FAILURE] I doubt someone of your obviously low station could convince anyone of anything.
